entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
